definition: an energetic attempt to achieve something, to contend against in or as if in a battle
details:
noun
- an energetic attempt to achieve something
= synonyms: struggle
- a hostile meeting of opposing military forces in the course of a war
= example: a hostile meeting of opposing military forces in the course of a war
= synonyms: engagement
- an open clash between two opposing groups (or individuals)
= synonyms: struggle
verb
- to contend against in or as if in a battle
= example: to contend against in or as if in a battle
= synonyms: combat
